verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who has the final say? Jehovah has the final say! Who has the final say? Jehovah has the final say!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jehovah turned my life around Jehovah turned my life around He makes a way Where there is no way Jehovah has the final say{/lang-eng}
